verbs.description: it time for [ARG0: the steelers] to [V: give] [ARGM-DIS: artie] burns [ARG1: a seat on the bench] the pittsburgh steelers head into their bye - week in much better shape than they were a month ago while they still have a ways to go as a team it looks like they are headed in the right direction however one player who is not is artie burns and it time to introduce him to the bench to say burns has had a rough time this season would be an immense understatement to say there is no hope for him is a bit extreme at this point burns the antonio brown pittsburgh steelers artie burns steelers tyler boyd bench
